name: Pavar
overview:
Founded in 1983, Pavar Furniture began its career as a family owned and operated business in a small wood working plant in Montreal. Over 25 years later, still a family business, Pavar is recognized as an industry leader in hardwood and metal chairs, barstools, lounge seating, tables, booths and custom contract furnishings.

Operating out of our head office and manufacturing plant (of over 30,000 square feet) in Montreal, Pavar maintains an extensive inventory along with the ability to manufacture your custom needs. Our expertise and experience is most prominent in our woodworking line of contract seating, tables, banquettes and custom design. Pavar’s manufacturing capabilities afford you the opportunity to create a custom product with respect to stain, frame details, frame modifications and fabric choices.

Our constantly evolving products, new models and designs provide you with more choices and a more diverse product line. From our trendy European offerings in both wood and metal, represented by our Biebi line, to our traditional and time-honored wood seating line, our mission is to constantly challenge ourselves and exceed your expectations.

Pavar is here to furnish you with products that capture the imagination….
